fullgame.name: Money And Lady | 财貌双全

name: Money And Lady Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS 7+
  • Processor: intel core i5
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 1060+ OR AMD Radeon RX480+
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS 10+
  • Processor: intel core i7+
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060+ OR AMD 5600XT+
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: "Money & Lady" is a party game that requires luck & management strategy! Haa! This is also the gentlemen's favorite game, the game won the New Earth Best Happiness Award and Not Tired to Replay Award! Support up to 4 players, and 7 different heroines is waiting for you...【Only FreeCity 20 days demo】
